Articles.Content: I don't even know if I signed up correctly! If you can read this I guess it worked

Hi Planetfall, looks like it worked ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There's a 3 post spambot trap which is why your post didn't show up right away, and you need one more post before you can edit your avatar, welcome to the forums, have fun and fly safe!

Thanks for the feed back! sorry it took me so long to reply, I'd completely forgot I started this thread.![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
You'll forget your own head next, and where *did* you last see your keys? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Interesting...

Oh yes, and welcome back to your welcome message. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

-Claw
